title: I know I don't post much anymore, but this really needs to be said.
body:
If you are the type of person who throws toilet paper away in your or anyone else bathroom trash can, heck you.

There is no possible way to know what it's been used for.  Someone could have blowed their nose in it or uhh..  relieved themselves or sanitized themselves or any number of gross things.  Just put the heckin toilet paper into the toilet.  If you don't have a need to flush at that moment, someone will.  stop being gross

~~SÃ¨x Crazed Eve~~
